ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok gonna get blunt.  This isn t a flame, we ve tried to say it nice dozens of times YOU ARENT FLAGGING YOUR ITEMS! You are just setting a flag ON YOUR CLIENT
ygData.messageBody:
Ok gonna get blunt. This isn't a flame, we've tried to say it nice dozens
of times

YOU ARENT FLAGGING YOUR ITEMS!

You are just setting a flag ON YOUR CLIENT that won't let you drop yer junk
on the ground.

Thanks!

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 3:39 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?


> No Drop items cannot be looted from another player in PvP unless they
> changed that recently. If I could tag all my items as No Drop it would
have
> a dramatic effect on looting in PvP.
>
> Kit
>
> Please use some common sense, this would have no effect on looting.
>
> Rokenn
